attributes.action: We the undersigned demand a referendum on article 50.
attributes.additional_details: Immediately on completion of informal leave settlement negotiations the UK people should be asked by referendum whether or not we wish the government to invoke article 50.
attributes.background: We the undersigned note that the people of the UK were clearly told that the EU referendum was advisory. We require the relevant government authorities to commence informal negotiations with the EU on a leave settlement.  A referendum on whether or not to invoke article 50 should then be held.
